decisions.name: Does_Current_Year_Renewal_CIHI_Exists
decisions.label: Does Current Year Renewal CIHI Exists

Flow.description: - Area of practice multi-select to single select -Registration Type defaulted to Pharmacist -Defaulted Addresses and Membership Status -Employer Lookups updated -Acknowledge screen - Employment Information update -Label updates from CIHI feedback -Only Open Pharmacy (Pharmacy_Status__c = Open) for employeer Names -Adding Education Records -Updated Exclusion logic -Updating flow for errors -Adding Active Check -Added End Date Logic -With Employment Information Updates -updated create employment Information Records -updated birth year field to Text from Number -added help text in for language section in PersonalInformationScreen
Flow.label: SF - Subflow - CIHI - Renewal Flow

value.stringValue: Highest Level of Post-Basic Education in Pharmacy

fields.name: basiceducationhelptext
fields.fieldText: The post-secondary institution, where a pharmacist completed the basic education program used to prepare them for practice.

fields.name: BasicUniversityMessage
fields.fieldText: If you have not found your basic education university, please select the checkbox and select one of the options below.

fields.name: Please_Select_Appropriate_Option_for_Basic_Education_University
fields.fieldText: Please Select Appropriate Option for Basic Education University

fields.name: Level_of_Basic_Education_in_Pharmacy
fields.helpText: The minimum education level used to prepare a health care provider for practice. This refers to the initial education in the heath care profession that it is used in order to obtain licensure with the regulatory body.

validationRule.errorMessage: Enter Valid year

fields.name: highestlevelhelptext
fields.fieldText: The post-secondary institution, w﻿here a pharmacist completed their highest education program.

fields.name: HighestEducationMessage
fields.fieldText: If you have not found your highest education university, please select the checkbox and select one of the options below.

fields.name: Please_Select_Appropriate_Option_for_Highest_Education_University
fields.fieldText: Please Select Appropriate Option for Highest Education University

fields.name: Highest_Level_Post_Basic_Edu_in_Pharmacy
fields.helpText: The provider’s highest education level attained. This includes any post-basic education.

fields.name: Year_of_Grad_Highest_of_Post_Basic_Edu1
fields.fieldText: Highest Level of Pharmacy Education Year

validationRule.errorMessage: Enter Valid year

fields.name: Employment_Status
fields.helpText: A provider’s work, occupational or vocational status at the time of renewal.

fields.name: Employed_in_Profession
fields.helpText: Whether a provider is employed in their profession at the time of renewal.

fields.name: Seeking_Employment
fields.helpText: Whether a provider is seeking employment (in or outside of the profession) at the time of renewal.

fields.name: Primary_Employment_Category
fields.helpText: The employer-employee relation at the time of renewal.

fields.name: Primary_Employer_Funding_Source
fields.helpText: The main funding source for each employment at the time of renewal.

fields.name: Primary_Employer_by_Staffing_Agency
fields.helpText: Whether a health care provider is employed by a staffing agency at the time of renewal.

fields.name: Primary_Employer_Virtual_Care_Amount
fields.helpText: The proportion of virtual care used to provide direct care at a provider’s site of practice.

fields.name: Primary_Employment_Area_of_Practice
fields.helpText: The major focus of activities at employment. Providers who have multiple roles at their site(s) of employment can select up to 3 that account for the majority of hours worked at that site.

fields.name: Primary_Place_of_Employment
fields.helpText: The setting where the provider is directly engaged in work associated with their profession as a pharmacist. Providers who work in multiple settings for a given employment can select up to 3 for each place of work that account for the majority of worked hours at that site.

fields.name: Primary_Place_of_Employment_2
fields.helpText: The setting where the provider is directly engaged in work associated with their profession as a pharmacist. Providers who work in multiple settings for a given employment can select up to 3 for each place of work that account for the majority of worked hours at that site.

fields.name: Primary_Place_of_Employment_3
fields.helpText: The setting where the provider is directly engaged in work associated with their profession as a pharmacist. Providers who work in multiple settings for a given employment can select up to 3 for each place of work that account for the majority of worked hours at that site.

fields.name: Primary_Employment_is_Multiple_Site_Emp
fields.helpText: Whether a provider works at more than one site for a single employer.

fields.name: Primary_Emp_Patient_Interaction_Type_one
fields.helpText: The method(s) of interaction between the provider and clients when providing direct care at the site pf practice. Providers with multiple methods of interaction will select up to 3 encounter modes that account for the majority of hours worked (in order from most to fewest hours) at that site.

fields.name: Primary_Emp_Patient_Interaction_Type_Two
fields.helpText: The method(s) of interaction between the provider and clients when providing direct care at the site pf practice. Providers with multiple methods of interaction will select up to 3 encounter modes that account for the majority of hours worked (in order from most to fewest hours) at that site.

fields.name: Primary_Patient_Interaction_Type_Three
fields.helpText: The method(s) of interaction between the provider and clients when providing direct care at the site pf practice. Providers with multiple methods of interaction will select up to 3 encounter modes that account for the majority of hours worked (in order from most to fewest hours) at that site.

fields.name: Primary_Employment_Annual_Earned_Hours
fields.helpText: The total annual hours of work earned for each of the provider’s employments. Earned hours include worked and benefit hours for which the provider has received or will receive sales. Please provide annual earned hours in HHHH. For example, 2500.

fields.name: Primary_Employment_Area_of_Practice_2
fields.helpText: The major focus of activities at employment. Providers who have multiple roles at their site(s) of employment can select up to 3 that account for the majority of hours worked at that site.

fields.name: Primary_Employment_Area_of_Practice_3
fields.helpText: The major focus of activities at employment. Providers who have multiple roles at their site(s) of employment can select up to 3 that account for the majority of hours worked at that site.

fields.helpText: The employer-employee relation at the time of renewal.

fields.name: Secondary_Employer_Funding_Source
fields.helpText: The main funding source for each employment at the time of renewal.

fields.name: CIHI_DisclaimerMessage
fields.fieldText: The following information is being collected on behalf of the Canadian Institute of Health Information (CIHI) for the purposes of the maintenance of a national database primarily for use in workforce planning.

fields.name: LanguageHelpText
fields.fieldText: Please list the languages you are able to provide service in, please select up to 3

fields.name: Concurrent_Reg_Province_Territory
fields.helpText: Any other Canadian province or territory that a provider is licensed in (for the same profession) at the time of renewal. Each provider may select up to 3 provinces/territories.

fields.name: Concurrent_Registration_Country
fields.helpText: Any other country that a provider is licensed in (for the same profession) at the time of renewal. Each provider may select up to 3 countries.
